message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product that I believe would be highly valuable to you.  Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,250?
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
